channel.title: Projects on Junyu Li
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Junyu Li

item.title: Transcriptor
item.description: Artifact-based transcription pipeline with resumable job tracking and deterministic outputs.

item.title: Belle SPA Inc – Internal AI Tools & Automation
item.description: On-prem LLM system replacing SaaS tools for cost control and internal data privacy.

item.title: SafeClick – Phishing Detection System
item.description: A production-grade zero-day phishing detection engine that combines probabilistic AI with deterministic security logic. Now live at safeclick.dev.

item.title: Long-Document LLM Pipeline for Financial Research
item.description: MapReduce-style orchestration for 20k-word inputs with schema validation and failure recovery. Demonstrates complex data workflow and architecture skills.
